DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Nigeria Optimistic on OPEC Action : Nigerian officials , speaking after separate meetings with Saudi Oil Minister Hisham Nazer and OPEC President Abdullah al-Attiyah , said they were optimistic that the organization will act to boost prices when it meets in March . Nigerian Oil Minister Don Etiebet , who agreed with Qatari Energy Minister Attiyah to propose a 5 % to 10 % output cut , stopped short of saying that key producer Saudi_Arabia had agreed OPEC should cut back.But he spoke_of agreement on ways of injecting new life into the market , where world benchmark Brent oil Friday languished near five-year lows at less than $ 14 a barrel in London , compared to OPEC ' s formal target of $ 21 . In New York , where the price is usually $ 1 more per barrel , spot crude futures closed at $ 14.72 a barrel .
